column5: Hi all, finally tried out the Gopro...hmmmmmm...more like GoFigure. Sound and pic quality were shot....hoping its just my computer and editing skills.  Anyway....here's a quick tour of our bay.       <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/9QsFzfktB1I?list=UUj99GM-EGBhHYh9tBhnLPeA" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
I thought the video quality was great  don't know what was with the sound, did you use the case back with the holes in it
Nice! The video was great quality. Don't know what's with the sound
Even if the waterproof housing was on there would be some sound. Nice video wish I still had a sled and lived in a area that I could use it
Great video the sound will come, check your previous posting for how we do whitefish.  Cheers Blizz

In my gopro I use it with the soundproof door and have it mounted on my helmet ad you can hear the sound of my snowmobile noooo problem Simon for best setting I use the 960p by 30 and mine is HD as well !!! If you put the door with the holes in it on make sure you don't get snow dust in it as it will fog it up and get it wet check my vids at vectordevil on YouTube I have lots of my gopro footage there I can also mount mine on the front of my sled too its amazing !!! Have fun with the gopro it's awesome thanks for sharing simon
beautiful ride into sunrise/sunset ... I got a gopro as well, still waiting to put it to the test, hope to get some under ice footage in february, but that sled is awesome
